What Triggers this?: Selecting "Save Changes" on manage users--add users page under settings.
What details should be included?: Include new user ID and all details on page

What Triggers this?: Selecting "Save Changes" on manage users--update users page under settings.
Selecting "Save Changes" on manage users--delete users page under settings.
What details should be included?: Include any modifications made (i.e., updated name, updated access role to…).

What Triggers this?: Selecting "Save Changes" on Configure Metrics--add metrics page under settings
What details should be included?: Include new metric name and all details on page

What Triggers this?: Selecting "Save Changes" on Configure Metrics--update metrics page under settings
What details should be included?: Include any modifications made (i.e., updated metric name, updated Label…).

What Triggers this?: Selecting "Save Changes" on Configure Metrics--delete metrics page under settings
Selecting "Submit" under Enter Data on Enter Data page
What details should be included?: Include name of metric and date recorded

What Triggers this?: Selecting "Submit" under Upload File on Enter Data page
What details should be included?: Include name of file (and, if possible, metric submitted and date recorded)
